      • getClassifiers

        java.util.List<Classifier> getClassifiers(java.lang.String uri)
        Returns a list of classifiers contained by the package, as well as all classifiers within its contained packages, linked/stereotyped through an SDONamespace stereotype where the stereotype uri matches the given uri.
        Parameters:
        uri - the SDO namespace URI
        Returns:
        a list of classifiers contained by the package, as wells as all classifiers within its contained packages, linked through an SDONamespace stereotype where the uri which matches the given uri.
        See Also:
        SDONamespace

      • getClassifier

        Classifier getClassifier(java.lang.String qualifiedName)
        Fetches a classifier using the given artifact, package or namespace qualified name.
        Throws:
        RepositoryException - if the classifier is not found
        Parameters:
        qualifiedName - the artifact, package or namespace qualified name
        Returns:
        the classifier

      • findClassifier

        Classifier findClassifier(java.lang.String qualifiedName)
        Searches for a classifier using the given artifact, package or namespace qualified name.
        Parameters:
        qualifiedName - the artifact, package or namespace qualified name
        Returns:
        the classifier or null if not found
